root.name: Xak III: The Eternal Recurrence
root.description: OverviewXak III: The Eternal Recurrence is the third and final entry in Xak action RPG series by Micro Cabin. The game was created by Micro Cabin and NEC for the PC-98/FM Towns computers in 1993 and a PC Engine CD version was released in 1994. Xak III was never officially released in English but Nick Livaditis (NightWolve) along with several translators and hackers created a translation patch for the PCE-CD version on June 14, 2004.

similar_games.game: Ys IV: The Dawn of Ys
